text: so when did this sprout up I first saw
it in the first week of July and I saw
it growing amongst the petunias and I
had a slight suspicion as to what it
might be and I put a picture on Facebook
and asked my friends if they thought it
was what I thought it was and nobody
seemed to know I don't think we've ever
had anyone who's come on well it may
have happened the past and no one's
owned up to it but we haven't seen
anything this lush have we all dodged no
but it is definitely a cannabis plant
underneath the concrete here that's
coming Patricius husband John was
charged with its removal think the seed
of this probably came from the
birdfeeder which hangs just above
outside their front door so I think the
seed probably came from though it's
quite common for bird seed to actually
contain a huge variety of plant seed and
cannabis has been known to come up from
it illegal to grow without a license the
cannabis plant had to go we've been told
we have to cut it up and their compost
it or take it to the police station or
even take it up to the local recycling
center
